caption.p: Photomicrograph of sectioned heart of control rat indicates normal myocardial fibril. Fig. 19. Sectioned heart of rat administered AESG 500 mg/kg indicates normal myocardial fibril. Fig. 20. Sectioned heart of rats administered AESG 1000 mg/kg also indicates normal myocardial fibril. Fig. 21 Sectioned heart of rat administered AESG 2000 mg/kg also indicates normal myocardial fibril.
